metadata.title: Who is José Sanahuja | +108 Certifications | SanahujaDev
metadata.description: Meet the 'Digital Partner' behind SanahujaDev. Discover my story, my +108 technical certifications, and my 5★ reviews as a 'web expert in Tenerife'.

hero.h1_lead: I'm not a ghost agency. I'm the person picking up the phone. A digital consultant in the Canary Islands obsessed with transparency and results. My promise isn't just a website; it's to walk the path with you.

story.title: From 'Freelancer' to 'Digital Partner'
story.content_1: SanahujaDev was born from a frustration you surely know: the 'abandoned website'. I saw friends and local businesses spend thousands on slow, buggy sites, whose developers (freelancers) vanished after delivery.
story.content_2: My brand was built as the antithesis of that. I don't sell a 'product' and leave. I provide a service and I stay. My 'Digital Partner' model is based on 12-month support. Because, as I always say, your success is my success.

proof.title: My Reputation in the Global Market
proof.content: Authority must be earned, not invented. This is my reputation on Fiverr, one of the most competitive platforms in the world. No filters, no tricks. This is what real clients say.

proofCard.quote: «José is an incredible professional. Not only is he technically brilliant (WPO 99), but he becomes part of your team. He is a true partner. He solved problems that 3 other developers couldn't.»

reviewsGrid.name: Joaco B.
reviewsGrid.content: He was very attentive and kept a close eye on the questions and revisions I had for the order. Highly recommended.

reviewsGrid.name: Fengjason
reviewsGrid.content: This is my second order with Mr. José, a really great experience. He helped me beyond what was agreed upon and I will definitely recommend him! Thank you very much, sir!

reviewsGrid.name: Alerco
reviewsGrid.content: The relationship with José Javier and his work are extraordinary.

reviewsGrid.name: ihatemyclass
reviewsGrid.content: Fantastic work! Even though I didn't express my availability at the start, they did an excellent job. They understand English well and are easy to work with.

reviewsGrid.name: Thomas 8.
reviewsGrid.content: Excellent service provider. Very happy with the communication, responsiveness, and José's general knowledge of database architecture. 100% recommended.

reviewsGrid.name: Jrgracec
reviewsGrid.content: Excellent seller, answered all my questions clearly and concisely. Highly recommended!

reviewsGrid.name: Jmloranzcoll
reviewsGrid.content: Did all the work as planned. Even though we had quite a lot of work, he did it step by step.

diplomas.title: My Obsession: +108 Technical Certifications
diplomas.content: A 'web expert in Tenerife' must prove it. I don't settle for 'it works'. I aim for WPO 99, perfect architecture, and clean code. This is the proof of my commitment to technical excellence.

ctaFinal.title: Ready to Talk to a Real Expert?
ctaFinal.content: Now that you've seen my 108 diplomas and my 5-star reviews... Shall we talk? Fill out the form and let's define what success means to you. No beating around the bush, no abandonment.
ctaFinal.subtext: Your success is my success. Let's start with total confidence.
